46#ifndef __sockpp_unix_addr_h
47#define __sockpp_unix_addr_h
48
49#include <sys/un.h>
50
51#include <cstring>
52#include <iostream>
53#include <string>
54
55#include "sockpp/platform.h"
56#include "sockpp/result.h"
57#include "sockpp/sock_address.h"
58#include "sockpp/types.h"
59
60namespace sockpp {
61
63
68class unix_address : public sock_address
69{
71 sockaddr_un addr_{};
72
74 static constexpr size_t SZ = sizeof(sockaddr_un);
75
76public:
78 static constexpr sa_family_t ADDRESS_FAMILY = AF_UNIX;
79
81 static constexpr size_t MAX_PATH_NAME = sizeof(sockaddr_un::sun_path);
82
87 unix_address() = default;
93 unix_address(const string& path);
99 unix_address(const string& path, error_code& ec) noexcept;
105 explicit unix_address(const sockaddr& addr) {
106 std::memcpy(&addr_, &addr, sizeof(sockaddr));
107 }
113 unix_address(const sock_address& addr) noexcept {
114 std::memcpy(&addr_, addr.sockaddr_ptr(), SZ);
115 }
120 unix_address(const sockaddr_un& addr) noexcept : addr_(addr) {}
125 unix_address(const unix_address& addr) : addr_(addr.addr_) {}
132 bool is_set() const noexcept override {
133 return addr_.sun_family == ADDRESS_FAMILY && addr_.sun_path[0] != '\0';
134 }
139 string path() const {
140 // Remember, if len==MAX, there's no NUL terminator
141 return string(addr_.sun_path, strnlen(addr_.sun_path, MAX_PATH_NAME));
142 }
151 socklen_t size() const override { return socklen_t(SZ); }
159 static result<unix_address> create(const string& path);
164 const sockaddr* sockaddr_ptr() const override {
165 return reinterpret_cast<const sockaddr*>(&addr_);
166 }
171 sockaddr* sockaddr_ptr() override { return reinterpret_cast<sockaddr*>(&addr_); }
176 const sockaddr_un* sockaddr_un_ptr() const { return &addr_; }
181 sockaddr_un* sockaddr_un_ptr() { return &addr_; }
187 string to_string() const { return string("unix:") + path(); }
188};
189

198std::ostream& operator<<(std::ostream& os, const unix_address& addr);
199
201} // namespace sockpp

203#endif // __sockpp_unix_addr_h
